attributes.additional_details:
The FA announced today that they have received a bid to sell Wembley Stadium and it looks like they are thinking seriously to accept it!
They are trying all the tricks in the hat to convince the public about their plan but forgot one and most important thing which is that the Wembley Stadium is the museum of football world and the dream of all footballers around the world. Not to mention, it is the home of our national team.
With all due respect to the FA, I think they don’t know what they are doing. Hence, the parliament and the government need to act quickly to stop them and protect the public interest. The FA is not merely selling the stadium, they selling the fans’ souls as well. 
I urge everyone who loves Wembley Stadium to sign this petition.
attributes.background: The FA announced today that they have received a bid to sell Wembley Stadium and it looks like they are thinking seriously to accept it!

rejection.details:
Any decision about selling Wembley Stadium is the responsibility of the Football Association, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could contact the FA directly about this issue:
http://www.thefa.com/about-football-association/contact-us

You could start a new petition to ask the UK Government to urge the FA not to sell Wembley Stadium.
